Hello all, I try to setup a cluster.

There is several Heritrix-1.11.0 suce=
ssfully running and registered at
JBOSS JNDI. Then HCC could not be started=
 with the next exception:   
----------------------------------------------=
----------
# java -cp hcc-0.2.0.jar org.archive.hcc.ClusterControllerBean
-=
-------------------------------------------------------
Feb 8, 2007 6:04:35=
 PM org.archive.hcc.ClusterControllerBean init
INFO: maxPerContainer settin=
g: 5
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError:
org/archive=
/util/JndiUtils at
org.archive.hcc.ClusterControllerBean.init(ClusterContro=
llerBean.java:803)
--------------------------------------------------------=


I have not found any manual for this. Where can I get any docs about
this=
 trouble and for building a cluster with HCC?

Thanks, p0ruchik.
